name: Revulsion
description: Revulsion is the missing link between old school classic first person shooters and modern day first person shooters. Imagine if the classic fps had evolved in a direction other than a story based experience, to being something much more brutal, with more advanced gameplay mechanics.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i7-950 (4 * 3000) or equivalent / AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 (1536 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
